title: Looking for Font - Good Times TV Show
content:
Hey all,

New to the Typophile forums and was wondering if anyone could help me locate the font from the Good Times TV Show back in the day. Been searching for a few days, to no avail. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!

- Chev

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328193249im_/http:/typophile.com/files/GT-4942171_6622.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [GT-4942171.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328193249/http:/typophile.com/files/GT-4942171.jpg) | 31.93 KB |
author: Chev

comments.content:
Welcome to typophile!

Looks like _[Souvenir](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328193249/http:/www.linotype.com/802/itcsouvenir-family.html?subviewmode=FONTS&samplestr=GOOD+TIMES)_ to me!  
By the way your in the wrong place for this topic… You should be on the [ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20150328193249/http:/typophile.com/forum/29).
